voice_instruct: A young woman's voice that shifts between playful wit, trembling vulnerability, and cold detached confidence, as if three people share one throat, haunting and beautiful

tracks.title: Little Lies
tracks.prompt: dreamy indie pop with shimmering synths and reverb-soaked vocals, ethereal and slightly unsettling, like a lullaby hiding a secret, dream pop atmosphere
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
I drew my mother's face from memory and made her kind
I drew my father sober with a gentle mind
I drew a girl named Shallan with a scholar's grace
And colored over every bruise upon her face

[chorus]
Little lies, little lies
Paint them pretty, paint them wise
If I draw the world the way I need it seen
Maybe I'll forget what lives between

[verse 2]
Lightweaving isn't magic, it's just what I do
I've been wearing other faces since before I knew
That the girl beneath the illusions doesn't have a name
She burned it with the house and walked away from shame

[chorus]
Little lies, little lies
Paint them pretty, paint them wise
If I draw the world the way I need it seen
Maybe I'll become my favorite dream

[bridge]
But the sketchbook knows
Every face I've worn
Is a page I tore
From the girl I mourn

[chorus]
Little lies, little lies
Crumbling slowly, crumbling wise
Someday I'll draw the truth and let it breathe
But not today, today I need to leave

tracks.title: Veil
tracks.prompt: dark sultry dream pop with trip-hop undertones, confident and dangerous, smoky bassline and clipped drums, a spy's anthem
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Hat pulled low and lies pulled high
I walk through Kharbranth with a stranger's eye
Shallan's scared but I don't flinch
Give me a con and I won't give an inch

[chorus]
I'm Veil, I'm the one who walks the night
I'm Veil, I'm the blade behind the light
Shallan can't handle what the darkness brings
So I step in and pull the strings

[verse 2]
Lightweaving wraps me like a second skin
Darkeyed and sharp, I blend right in
The Ghostbloods think they've found their mark
But I'm the fire they brought to the dark

[chorus]
I'm Veil, I'm the one who walks the night
I'm Veil, I'm the blade behind the light
Shallan can't handle what the darkness brings
So I step in and pull the strings

[bridge]
But I'm not real, am I
Just a mask she built to survive
A shield of swagger and street-sharp lies
Keeping the broken girl alive

[chorus]
I'm Veil, I was the one who walked the night
I'm Veil, I was the blade behind the light
But Shallan found the strength that darkness brings
So I let go, I let go of the strings

tracks.title: Radiant
tracks.prompt: powerful ethereal pop with crystalline synths and martial precision, regal and controlled, dream pop meets military march, beautiful and terrifying
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Stand up straight, the Lightweavers are watching
Speak with grace, the court demands the show
Shallan breaks and Veil would rather vanish
So I appear when neither one can go

[chorus]
I am Radiant, the armor and the crown
I am Radiant, I never let us down
Perfect posture, perfect blade
I'm the soldier Shallan made

[verse 2]
I hold the sword when Shallan's hands are shaking
I speak the words when Veil has lost her nerve
Pattern hums beside me, always waiting
I'm the face that duty taught to serve

[chorus]
I am Radiant, the armor and the crown
I am Radiant, I never let us down
Perfect posture, perfect blade
I'm the soldier Shallan made

[bridge]
But who am I when no one needs protecting
When the war is done and all the masks come down
I am the strongest of the three reflecting
And the first to turn to mist without a sound

[outro]
I am Radiant
I am fading
I am Radiant
I am waiting

tracks.title: The Sketchbook
tracks.prompt: intimate acoustic dream pop with delicate fingerpicking and soft vocal layers, fragile and beautiful, an artist's confession
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
I draw because the world is more than I can hold
I draw because the colors keep the terrors from the cold
Symmetrical designs that Pattern taught me how to see
And portraits of the people I pretend that I can be

[chorus]
The sketchbook holds the truth I cannot speak
Every line a memory, every shade a week
Of hiding in the pages where the lies are drawn in ink
The sketchbook knows me better than I think

[verse 2]
I drew the Shattered Plains from Jasnah's balcony
I drew Kaladin's despair when he refused to see
I drew Adolin in sunlight with that careless grin
And drew myself three times without the girl within

[chorus]
The sketchbook holds the truth I cannot speak
Every line a memory, every shade a week
Of hiding in the pages where the lies are drawn in ink
The sketchbook knows me better than I think

[bridge]
Someday I'll draw the night my father died
Someday I'll draw the mother I tried to hide
Someday the sketchbook and the girl will be the same
Someday I'll sign my real name

[outro]
The sketchbook knows
The sketchbook sees
Every version, every me

tracks.title: Pattern's Hum
tracks.prompt: quirky dream pop with unusual time signature elements, playful but eerie, whimsical synth patterns over warm bass, like a nursery rhyme from another dimension
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Mmm, mmm, the lies are delicious
Mmm, mmm, the truths are nutritious
I am Pattern, I am the hum in the wall
I am the one who remembers it all

[chorus]
Hum hum hum, the pattern is forming
Hum hum hum, the Cryptic is storming
She says I am annoying, I find this amusing
The truth is she needs me, the truth is confusing

[verse 2]
Shallan killed her first spren, yes, a terrible fact
She locked it away in the back of her back
I came because the lie was so magnificently bright
A Lightweaver's truth is hidden in the night

[chorus]
Hum hum hum, the pattern is forming
Hum hum hum, the Cryptic is storming
She says I am terrible at humor and jest
But I am her bond-spren, I know she's the best

[bridge]
What is a lie but a pattern inverted
What is the truth but a lie that's been converted
I hum because mathematics is song
And Shallan has been singing along

[chorus]
Hum hum hum, the pattern is forming
Hum hum hum, this bond is transforming
She speaks the truth at last and I feel complete
The girl and the Cryptic, a pattern replete

tracks.title: Red Hair and Ruin
tracks.prompt: dark emotional dream pop with trembling vocals and heavy reverb, slow build from whisper to wail, deeply haunting, a trauma song wrapped in beauty
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Red hair like my mother's, burning bright
She smiled in the morning and she killed in the night
I found her with the poison and the intent laid bare
A daughter shouldn't have to know her mother doesn't care

[chorus]
Red hair and ruin, that's my bloodline's gift
Red hair and ruin and an ever-widening rift
Between who I was born to be and who I had to become
The day I killed my mother, I became everyone and no one

[verse 2]
Father took the blame to shield me from the dark
But the secret was a Soulcaster eating through his heart
He broke my brothers one by one with fury and with drink
And I just stood there drawing at the edge of every brink

[chorus]
Red hair and ruin, that's my bloodline's gift
Red hair and ruin and an ever-widening rift
Between who I was born to be and who I had to become
The day I killed my father, I became three, and then none

[bridge]
Testament screamed when I broke the bond
A living blade turned deadeye, gone beyond
I buried that truth so deep inside
That I invented two more girls to hide

[outro]
Red hair and ruin
Red hair and ruin
But the girl beneath the red
Is still alive, not dead

tracks.title: Lightweaver's Oath
tracks.prompt: building dream pop anthem with layers of vocals and shimmer, starting spare and ending massive, each verse unlocking more sound, transformative
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
I killed my mother
There, I said the words that burn
The first truth spoken, the first page I turn
Pattern hums louder, the Stormlight responds
A Lightweaver's oath is built on her wrongs

[chorus]
Speak the truth, speak it loud
Every word a crack in the shroud
I am Shallan, not Veil, not Radiant, just me
And the truth will set the Lightweaver free

[verse 2]
I killed my father with a blade of living light
The second truth extracted from the darkest night
He begged me, and I did it, and I'd do it again
Because the monster wore my father's face but wasn't him by then

[chorus]
Speak the truth, speak it loud
Every word a crack in the shroud
I am Shallan, not Veil, not Radiant, just me
And the truth will set the Lightweaver free

[bridge]
I am terrified
I am three girls stitched into one
But the thread that holds me is the truth I've spun
Pattern hums, Testament stirs
And I accept that all the pain is hers, is mine, is ours

[outro]
I am Shallan Davar
I have always been enough
I am Shallan Davar
And the truth is, I am loved

tracks.title: Becoming One
tracks.prompt: triumphant dream pop with full lush production, walls of shimmering sound, cathartic and beautiful, three melodies weaving into one, album closer that resolves all tension
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Veil takes off her hat and sets it down
Radiant sheathes the blade without a sound
Two phantoms made of fear and need and pride
Returning to the girl they lived inside

[chorus]
I'm becoming one, I'm becoming whole
Every fractured piece returning to my soul
Three of me was how I stayed alive
One of me is how I'll finally thrive

[verse 2]
The lies I told were shelters from the rain
The truths I speak are windows through the pain
Pattern hums a frequency of peace
And Testament stirs gently, finding release

[chorus]
I'm becoming one, I'm becoming whole
Every fractured piece returning to my soul
Three of me was how I stayed alive
One of me is how I'll finally thrive

[bridge]
Adolin holds my hand and doesn't flinch
At the girl who killed her parents, inch by inch
He sees the real Shallan, scars and all
And loves me standing, loves me when I fall

[outro]
One of me
Finally, one of me
Shallan, just Shallan
And that's enough to be
